definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: woven stuff, web, esp. as covering;—abs. [[הַנְּסוּכָה עַל־]] ´[[הַמּ]] Is 25:7 the web that is woven over all the nations (i.e. mourning-veil, symb. of distress; ‖[[הַלּוֹט הַלּוֹט]]); = bed- covering Is 28:20 (in fig.). Perhaps also ´[[לִנְסׂךְ מ]] Is 30:1 weave a web (‖[[לַעֲשׂוֹת עֵחָה]]), ref. to negotiations with Egypt (so Vulgate Aq Ew De Che Di; > LXX Ges Hi Kn Brd Du pour a libation; ´[[מ]] not elsewhere = [[נֶסֶךְ]]).
